articles.description: Arizona’s Family has put together a searchable chart so that you can see the capacity at individual hospitals as COVID-19 continue to surge in Arizona.

articles.author: Snejana Farberov
articles.title: Healthy high school senior, 18, dies of COVID just days after diagnosis - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sarah Simental, from Illinois, died of COVID-19 complications a day after Christmas, and less than a week after testing positive for the virus. She and her parents initially thought it was a cold.
articles.content: Sarah Simental had just celebrated her 18th birthday last month and was looking forward to graduating from high school next spring, when COVID-19 suddenly took her life earlier this week, just days a… [+3737 chars]
